text: Va agar [monandi Bani Isroil] ʙar onon muqarrar mekardem, ki "[nofarmononi] xudro ʙikused jo az xonavu sahraton ʙerun ʙiraved", cuz andake az eson [ʙa on dasturho] amal namekardand. Va agar ʙa on ci andarz doda sudand, amal mekardand, ʙe tardid ʙarojason ʙehtar va dar pojdorison [ʙar din] muassirtar ʙud
